name: ORS National Unusable Property Boxes
description: A national breakdown of property box capacity and a breakdown of property box allocation to active/inactive/in transfer prisoners in order to show the number of boxes which are unusable PND0018 - v00.00.01 Last Modified: 05/09/12

dataset.name: Property Allocation
dataset.query: PROP_CAPACITY_ AS (SELECT AT_INT_LOC_EST.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, AT_INT_LOC_EST.AGY_LOC_ID AS AGY_LOC_ID, SUM(AT_LUL.capacity) AS TOTAL_CAPACITY, DT_PPTY_COUNT.PPTY_COUNT AS PPTY_COUNT FROM OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_INT_LOC_EST, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p.Property_Container_ID) AS PPTY_COUNT, p.Agy_Loc_ID FROM oms_owner.offender_ppty_containers p, oms_owner.user_accessible_caseloads uac WHERE p.active_flag = 'Y' AND uac.caseload_id = p.agy_loc_id AND uac.username = (SELECT username FROM context_) GROUP BY p.Agy_Loc_ID) DT_PPTY_COUNT, OMS_OWNER.INT_LOC_USAGE_LOCATIONS AT_LUL, OMS_OWNER.INTERNAL_LOCATION_USAGES AT_LU WHERE (AT_LUL.INTERNAL_LOCATION_USAGE_ID = AT_LU.INTERNAL_LOCATION_USAGE_ID) AND (AT_INT_LOC_EST.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_LU.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_INT_LOC_EST.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_INT_LOC_EST.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_INT_LOC_EST.AGY_LOC_ID = DT_PPTY_COUNT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND AT_LUL.USAGE_LOCATION_TYPE = 'BOX' GROUP BY AT_INT_LOC_EST.DESCRIPTION, AT_INT_LOC_EST.AGY_LOC_ID, DT_PPTY_COUNT.PPTY_COUNT), dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT(AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION) AS DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID AS AGY_LOC_ID, DT_RECYLABLE_WITHLOC.COUNT AS COUNT, DT_RECYCLABLE_NO_LOC.COUNT AS PROPERTY_WITHOUT_A_LOCATION_57, DT_PROP_CORRECT_ALLOC.COUNT AS PROPERTY_ALLOCATED_TO_ACTIVE52, PROP_CAPACITY_.TOTAL_CAPACITY FROM OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, PROP_CAPACITY_, (SELECT COUNT(p.Property_Container_ID) AS COUNT, p.Agy_Loc_ID, h.status_display || h.in_out_status AS CommunityStatus FROM oms_owner.offender_ppty_containers p, oms_owner.v_header_block h WHERE p.active_flag = 'Y' AND p.offender_book_id = h.offender_book_id AND p.Internal_Location_ID IS NULL AND h.status_display || h.in_out_status IN ('ActiveIN', 'ActiveOUT') GROUP BY p.agy_loc_id, h.status_display || h.in_out_status) DT_RECYCLABLE_NO_LOC, (SELECT COUNT(p.Property_Container_ID) AS COUNT, p.Agy_Loc_ID FROM oms_owner.offender_ppty_containers p, oms_owner.v_header_block h WHERE p.active_flag = 'Y' AND p.offender_book_id = h.offender_book_id AND NOT p.Internal_Location_ID IS NULL AND h.status_display || h.in_out_status IN ('ActiveIN', 'ActiveOUT') GROUP BY p.agy_loc_id) DT_PROP_CORRECT_ALLOC, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, (SELECT COUNT(p.Property_Container_ID) AS COUNT, p.Agy_Loc_ID, h.status_display || h.in_out_status AS CommunityStatus FROM oms_owner.offender_ppty_containers p, oms_owner.v_header_block h WHERE p.active_flag = 'Y' AND p.offender_book_id = h.offender_book_id AND NOT p.Internal_Location_ID IS NULL AND h.status_display || h.in_out_status IN ('ActiveTRN', 'InactiveOUT') GROUP BY p.Agy_Loc_ID, h.status_display || h.in_out_status) DT_RECYLABLE_WITHLOC WHERE (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND ( PROP_CAPACITY_.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID ) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = DT_RECYLABLE_WITHLOC.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = DT_RECYCLABLE_NO_LOC.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = DT_PROP_CORRECT_ALLOC.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_))), dataset_ AS (SELECT DESCRIPTION, AGY_LOC_ID, COUNT, PROPERTY_WITHOUT_A_LOCATION_57, PROPERTY_ALLOCATED_TO_ACTIVE52, TOTAL_CAPACITY-PROPERTY_ALLOCATED_TO_ACTIVE52 AS V_REMAINING, TOTAL_CAPACITY, (COUNT/(TOTAL_CAPACITY-PROPERTY_ALLOCATED_TO_ACTIVE52)*100) AS V_UNUSABLE FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: COUNT
field.display: Property with a location Allocated to In Transits or Inactives

field.name: PROPERTY_WITHOUT_A_LOCATION_57
field.display: Property without a Location Allocated to Active Prisoners

field.name: PROPERTY_ALLOCATED_TO_ACTIVE52
field.display: Property Allocated to Active Prisoners With Location

dataset.name: Property Capacity
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_INT_LOC_EST.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, AT_INT_LOC_EST.AGY_LOC_ID AS AGY_LOC_ID, SUM(AT_LUL.capacity) AS TOTAL_CAPACITY, DT_PPTY_COUNT.PPTY_COUNT AS PPTY_COUNT FROM OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_INT_LOC_EST, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p.Property_Container_ID) AS PPTY_COUNT, p.Agy_Loc_ID FROM oms_owner.offender_ppty_containers p, oms_owner.user_accessible_caseloads uac WHERE p.active_flag = 'Y' AND uac.caseload_id = p.agy_loc_id AND uac.username = (SELECT username FROM context_) GROUP BY p.Agy_Loc_ID) DT_PPTY_COUNT, OMS_OWNER.INT_LOC_USAGE_LOCATIONS AT_LUL, OMS_OWNER.INTERNAL_LOCATION_USAGES AT_LU WHERE (AT_LUL.INTERNAL_LOCATION_USAGE_ID = AT_LU.INTERNAL_LOCATION_USAGE_ID) AND (AT_INT_LOC_EST.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_LU.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_INT_LOC_EST.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_INT_LOC_EST.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_INT_LOC_EST.AGY_LOC_ID = DT_PPTY_COUNT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND AT_LUL.USAGE_LOCATION_TYPE = 'BOX' GROUP BY AT_INT_LOC_EST.DESCRIPTION, AT_INT_LOC_EST.AGY_LOC_ID, DT_PPTY_COUNT.PPTY_COUNT), dataset_ AS (SELECT DESCRIPTION, AGY_LOC_ID, TOTAL_CAPACITY, PPTY_COUNT, SUM(NaN) AS V_REMAINING FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: All Establishments
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID AS AGY_LOC_ID FROM OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_))), dataset_ AS (SELECT DESCRIPTION, AGY_LOC_ID FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE AGY_LOC_ID <> 'ZZGHI')

field.name: $ref:PROPERTY_ALLOCATED_TO_ACTIVE52
field.display: No. Active Boxes Assigned to Active Prisoners With a Location

field.name: $ref:PROPERTY_WITHOUT_A_LOCATION_57
field.display: No. Boxes Assigned to Active Prisoners without a Property Location

field.name: $ref:COUNT
field.display: No. Boxes Assigned to Inactive/In Transfer Prisoners with a Property Location
